you take the best of me oh babygirl you lookin so nice would you like to be the apple of me eye dont be shy its ok for you to say hi im a rida plus you look like you down to ride ya let me know ya tell me things that you like to do let me hold ya feel the vibe that were goin through let me be the one girl to give you what you need the way that you smile make me think you feelin me its all to the good like a natural high know the sexy mammies only ride by my side

babybash
supp lil breezy damn you lookin jazzy they call me baby bashy how you doin thanks for askin im grafty down to call give out nasty down with the clock i see the strawberry daddy ghetto plants me cause once you representin then you pass me and since im so sick and tired of the trashy its love its groovy dinner and a movie just poofin on a doopy it in a can goin doin baby its all that holla holla imma call back and i could see that no matter the way your dress youre a ball rag thats all to the gravy train video material with some mary j

cmon now up in the club thats where we be me and the whole team ridaz freshly centered dress so clean at the club i noticed you sippin a tall glass of white wine how you doin you wearin jeans that fit the hips perfect smelled your perfume when you walked by its antsy you were dressed to kill hypnotized your whole stillo girl was mesmerizin i stepped up and ask if you liked another drink and maybe conversate a bit and at first she played a lil bit hard to get but that show me she wasnt easy you feel me
